impact_types.percent: Difference compared to baseline as a percentage of the previous year's total value (baseline + $t(common:action_other))

data_series_input.data_series_tooltip: Use numeric values separated by semicolons or tabs. Decimal numbers can use dots or commas as decimal separators.
data_series_input.data_series_advanced_info:
This field accepts a series of values separated by semicolons or tabs, which means you can paste a series of values from Excel or something similar.
NOTE: Values must not be separated by commas (",").
Decimal numbers can use either decimal points or decimal commas.
The first value represents the year 2020 and the series can continue up to the year 2050 (a total of 31 values).
If values are missing for a year, you can leave it blank, for example ";1;;;;5" can be used to specify the values 1 and 5 for the years 2021 and 2025.

effect.to_year_by_year_info: Note that there is a small margin of error around the 14th decimal when converting due to "floating point errors".
effect.to_absolute_info: Note that there is a small margin of error around the 14th decimal when converting due to "floating point errors".

roadmap.bad_decoding:
The file seems to use an unknown encoding as the interpreted text contains the character '�' which indicates that a character could not be interpreted correctly (probably Å, Ä or Ö).
You can still use this file, but if you are not completely sure that it *should* contain the character '�' it is recommended that you convert the file to UTF-8 encoding and try again.
roadmap.scale_deprecated: The 'Scale' column is not supported and will be ignored.
roadmap.scale_deprecated_extended: $t(forms:roadmap.scale_deprecated) If the column contains any scales, please bake them into the unit or value instead. Example: unit 'MW' rather than unit 'kW' with scale 'thousand'.
